definitions.definition: An absurd , grotesque , misrepresentative or grossly inferior likeness or imitation.
examples: A battlefield trial is a travesty of justice.

definitions.definition: A pastiche , parody , or stylistic imitation; a burlesque literary or artistic imitation (typically of a more serious work).
An appalling event, situation or outcome (especially in relation to another outcome to which it is grossly inferior).

main_definition: An absurd , grotesque , misrepresentative or grossly inferior likeness or imitation.
secondary_definitions: A pastiche , parody , or stylistic imitation; a burlesque literary or artistic imitation (typically of a more serious work).
( sometimes proscribed ) An appalling event, situation or outcome (especially in relation to another outcome to which it is grossly inferior).
